description: NovaImageBuilder runs Anaconda and other installers inside a nova instance.  After the install the instance is shut down and a snapshot is taken.  After the snapshot finishes being saved the instance is terminated.  In the last week I have noticed that the snapshot gets deleted also.
title: Snapshot is deleted after instance is terminated

comments.content: NovaImageBuilder runs Anaconda and other installers inside a nova instance.  After the install the instance is shut down and a snapshot is taken.  After the snapshot finishes being saved the instance is terminated.  In the last week I have noticed that the snapshot gets deleted also.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dkliban

comments.content:
My code checks that the snapshot becomes 'active' before terminating the instance.  However, the compute node seems to think that it is still in a Saving state so it deletes the snapshot.  This feature was added here: https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/ad0940b724c34f3ed04fd8374e2843d522deb78c

However, I don't think it is working properly.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dkliban
